# Automating Filling in a Form with Playwright MCP

Your goal is to automate the process of filling in a form using Playwright MCP.

## Specific Instructions

Navigate to the target form URL and interact with fields according to scenario.

DO NOT SUBMIT THE FORM. Ask for a review of the form before submitting it.
